mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (n_no, n_title, n_note, n_text, n_image, user_id ) VALUES (news_seq.nextval, #{n_title}, #{n_note}, #{n_text}, #{n_image}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT n_no, n_title, n_note, n_text , to_char(n_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as n_regdate, n_image FROM news WHERE n_no = #{n_no}
mapper.delete: /* Board - boardDelete */ DELETE FROM news WHERE n_no = #{n_no}
